name: Shovel Guy
description:
---------------------------------

MADE FOR LUDUM DARE 48

THEME: Deeper and Deeper

---------------------------------

Dig deeper by solving puzzles and trying to get a high score!

---------------------------------

Controls:

A + D : Move Left and Right

S : Dig Down

W : Jump

Space : Pickup Block
